author: BelgianBricker
title: Clowns and cannons: a dream come true
review:
Wow. what a great set do we have here. Yes, it is DUPLO, but just look at it: everybody loves clowns, everybody loves cannons and everybody surely loves clowns being shot form a cannon :D

This set isn't much when it comes to building stuff. There isn't actually much to build. But that's is OK, because this set is all about play and imagination. Even as an adult I enjoy myself shooting those clowns out of the cannon. The mechanism is very simply, easy to use and works perfectly.

The clowns look amazing, although it might have been a tad better iff they actually had different looks instead of simply color-swaps. 

The car and motorcycle are great, and so is the nice addition of the umbrellalalala. When combined with other circus themed sets, this nice little clown-pack will offer endless times of fun and entertainment. 

Come to think: when is LEGO going to do an actual Circus City- theme?

PROS

-great fun and play
-everything works as it should
-nice bright colors

CONS

-none :D
